name: Road Accident With Dangerous Goods VR Training
name_original: Road Accident With Dangerous Goods VR Training
description:
Train your professional skills in Road Accident With Dangerous Goods VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

In the VR Simulator you will appear in the situation of the road accident with your truck and the other car. You will learn how to properly behave in situation, how to evaluate risks, check the equipment and communicate with your coordinator and other drivers.

Road Accident With Dangerous Goods VR Training was developed for professionals by professionals (including NEBOSH certified HSE). It is suitable for a wide variety of workers.

If you need extended corporate licensing for Road Accident With Dangerous Goods VR Training training please contact us for the details.
